wmndsPageBannerProps.name: title
wmndsPageBannerProps.description: Required. Title content to use in the banner.

wmndsPageBannerProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsPageBannerProps.description: Required. HTML content to use in the banner.

wmndsPageBannerProps.name: image
wmndsPageBannerProps.description: Required. Url for the image to be displayed in the banner.

wmndsPageBannerProps.name: mode
wmndsPageBannerProps.description: Transport mode the banner relates to. This will determine the icon and background colour which is displayed. Accepted values are bus, rail, metro, roads, walk and cycle. If not set the banner will use WMN default colours.

wmndsPageBannerProps.name: logo
wmndsPageBannerProps.description: Url for the logo image to be displayed in the banner.

wmndsPageBannerProps.name: logoAltText
wmndsPageBannerProps.description: Required. Alt text to describe the logo image. This value is not required if a logo is not used.
